content: Hello, is it possible to get a dependency graph of every CGU/module inside of a rustc backend? im working with a library (libnvvm) that has a way of lazy loading a module, aka loading only what is being used, but to do this i need to know what modules depend on which.

although i would need the graph to be... backwards
because it looks at the functions that previous modules use and it only loads that from the module, so if A uses foo from B, i need to load A first, then B
